title: PMC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 255 Intern, Gardener Posts
description: The Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 255 Intern and Gardener Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.  Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical, Electrical, Civil Engineering, 10th can apply for the PMC Notification 2026 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details,...
